events.text: Runner, the deal we’ve struck with your people expects of you to run as far as possible within our realm.
Also, feel free to dispose of the lost souls roaming about.
Depending on how you do, we may consider sending you back to your un-homely home after you find your demise here...
Let's see how far you can get first...
[i]You’ll accumulate points as you go to the right. Killing enemies also gives you points[/i]
